Name: Druid's Natural Fury
Story Background: Druids channel the wrath of nature to disrupt enemy magic, summoning fierce beasts to aid them.
Ability: Counter target spell. Then, create a green Beast creature token with power and toughness equal to that spell's mana cost.
Appearance Description: The earth rumbles as the druid invokes the primal forces, summoning a beast from the natural world to devour the spell.
